items.title: Napa County Accepting Temporary Event Permit Applications
items.summary: The County of Napa will begin accepting Temporary Event Permit applications starting April 1, 2021.  The State Health Order has recently been amended to allow outdoor live events starting next month. Under the State...

items.title: Napa County’s Dr. Karen Relucio is Woman of the Year
items.summary:
Napa County’s public health officer, Dr. Karen Relucio, who led the community response to the coronavirus pandemic, providing critical direction to limit infections and save lives, has been named Woman of the Year by Sen. Bill Dodd. 
						 Read on...
